configs.additionalSettings: {"intermediateLink":[{"customLinkFilterRegex":"\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+-\\d+(?!-fdroid)","filterByLinkText":true,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false}],"customLinkFilterRegex":"","filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false,"versionExtractWholePage":false,"requestHeader":[{"requestHeader":"User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/114.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36"}],"defaultPseudoVersioningMethod":"APKLinkHash","trackOnly":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+-\\d+","matchGroupToUse":"","versionDetection":false,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"apkFilterRegEx":"","invertAPKFilter":false,"autoApkFilterByArch":true,"appName":"","shizukuPretendToBeGooglePlay":false,"allowInsecure":false,"exemptFromBackgroundUpdates":false,"skipUpdateNotifications":false,"about":"","refreshBeforeDownload":false,"supportFixedAPKURL":false}
